remarks: An atom is covered by its join with a different atom.  (Contributed by NM, 7-Feb-2012.)
statement:
atcvr1.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
atcvr1.c $e |- C = ( <o ` K ) $.
atcvr1.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
atcvr1 $p |- ( ( K e. HL /\ P e. A /\ Q e. A ) -> ( P =/= Q <-> P C ( P .\/ Q ) ) ) $.
